Class SceneTicker

java.lang.Object
  com.threerings.tudey.server.util.SceneTicker
Direct Known Subclasses:
SceneTicker.DedicatedThread, SceneTicker.EventThread
public abstract class SceneTicker
extends Object

Ticks some number of scene managers.
